trans-unit.source: Represents a field that is displayed as text in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 表示为数据绑定控件中的文本显示的字段。

trans-unit.source: The BoundField class is used by data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) to display the value of a field as text.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件使用 BoundField 类 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) 将显示为文本字段的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The BoundField object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: 根据使用它的数据绑定控件以不同方式显示该 BoundField 对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a BoundField object as a column, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件显示为一列，BoundField 对象时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件将其显示为一行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To specify the field to display in a BoundField object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property to the field's name.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要显示 BoundField 对象中显示的字段，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>属性字段的名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The field's value can be HTML-encoded before it is displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在字段的值可以是 HTML 编码显示通过设置之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can apply a custom formatting string to the field's value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置应用于字段的值的自定义的格式设置字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property is `true`, the encoded string value of the field is used in the custom format string.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>属性是`true`，自定义格式字符串中使用的字段的编码的字符串值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，格式设置字符串被应用于字段值中，仅当数据绑定控件处于只读模式。

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要将格式设置字符串应用于值显示数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a field's value is null, you can display a custom caption by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段的值为 null，则可以通过设置显示的自定义标题<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BoundField object can also automatically convert empty string ("") field values to null values by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: BoundField 对象可以还自动将转换为空字符串 ("") 通过设置字段值为 null 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can hide a BoundField object in a data-bound control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置隐藏数据绑定控件中的 BoundField 对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the value of a field from being modified in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止在编辑模式中被修改的字段的值，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control), you can hide a BoundField object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在将记录插入该支持数据绑定控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件)，你可以通过设置隐藏 BoundField 对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This is commonly done when you want to hide an automatically generated key field in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 通常这是当你想要隐藏在插入模式下自动生成的键字段。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the header and footer sections of a BoundField object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义 BoundField 对象页眉和页脚部分。

trans-unit.source: To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 若要在页眉或页脚部分中显示标题，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>属性，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是在标头部分中显示文本，你可以通过设置内显示图像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The header section can be hidden in the BoundField object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 标头部分可以通过设置隐藏 BoundField 对象中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 一些数据绑定控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件) 可显示或隐藏控件的整个标头部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual bound field.
trans-unit.target: 这些数据绑定控件不支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>单个绑定字段的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示或隐藏的数据绑定控件的整个标头部分 （如果可用），请使用控件的`ShowHeader`属性。

trans-unit.source: You also can customize the appearance of the BoundField object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以自定义 BoundField 对象 （如字体颜色、 背景色等） 的外观的设置的字段的不同部分的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: |Style property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>|The style settings for the child Web server controls of the BoundField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>|The style settings for the footer section of the BoundField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>|The style settings for the header section of the BoundField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>|The style settings for the data items in the BoundField object.|
trans-unit.target: |样式属性 |说明 | |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>|BoundField 对象的子 Web 服务器控件的样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>|BoundField 对象页脚部分的样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>|BoundField 对象的标头部分的样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>|BoundField 对象中的数据项的样式设置。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>的新实例

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数通常用时将字段添加到的动态创建的数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection.
trans-unit.target: 动态地添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象转换为数据绑定控件，创建一个新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到数据绑定控件的字段集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中，添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 动态，你可以将字段添加到的数据绑定控件中，尽管强烈建议该字段是静态声明，然后显示或隐藏，根据需要。

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all of your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 静态声明所有你字段会减小父数据绑定控件的视图状态的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the formatting string specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*> property is applied to field values when the data-bound control that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定的格式设置字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>，其中包含数据绑定控件时，将属性应用于字段值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>对象处于编辑模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>) have different display modes that allow the user to read, edit, or insert records.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>) 具有不同的显示模式，允许用户读取、 编辑或插入记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，通过将指定的格式设置字符串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>仅在数据绑定控件是否处于只读模式时，将属性应用于字段值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to values displayed while the data-bound control is in edit mode, set the ApplyFormatInEditMode property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要应用到数据绑定控件处于编辑模式时显示的值的格式设置字符串，请将 ApplyFormatInEditMode 属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object does not automatically remove the formatting when the field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象不会自动删除格式设置的数据源中更新字段时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the formatting as part of the value stored, you will need to remove the formatting programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不希望的格式存储的值的一部分，你将需要删除格式设置以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the formatting string to field values in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要将格式设置字符串应用于编辑模式; 中的字段值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将空字符串值 ("") 在数据源中更新数据字段时自动转换为 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the user might enter an empty string for a field value when updating or inserting records.
trans-unit.target: 有时用户可能为字段值更新或插入记录时输入空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use the ConvertEmptyStringToNull property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to null when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: ConvertEmptyStringToNull 属性用于指定是否为空字符串值自动转换为 null 时数据源中更新数据字段。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > By default, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object displays null values as empty strings.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象可显示 null 值为空字符串。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To display a different value, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示不同的值，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to automatically convert empty string values to null values; otherwise, the <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要将空字符串值自动转换为 null 值;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将当前的属性复制<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>到指定的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object created by the method.
trans-unit.target: CopyProperties 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法复制当前的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>方法创建的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref>以复制当前属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>到。

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object to.
trans-unit.target: CreateField 方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来创建一个空<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>要复制当前的属性对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象传递给。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data field to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定到的数据字段的名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataField property to specify the name of the data field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: DataField 属性用于指定要绑定到的数据字段的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: The values of the specified field are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object as text.
trans-unit.target: 指定字段的值显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>以文本形式的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: You can optionally format the displayed text by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: （可选） 可以通过设置来格式化显示的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a field's value is null, an empty string ("") is displayed for the value by default.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果字段的值为 null，空字符串 ("") 默认情况下为该值显示。

trans-unit.source: To specify an alternate caption, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定备用的标题，请设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data field to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要将绑定到的数据字段的名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定字段的值的显示格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataFormatString property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用数据属性指定的值中显示的自定义显示格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: If the DataFormatString property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置数据属性，该字段的值将显示不带任何特殊格式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In versions of ASP.NET earlier than 3.5, you must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A> property to `false` in order to format fields that are not string data types.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 在之前的版本 ASP.NET 3.5，你必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>属性`false`若要设置格式的字段设置非字符串数据类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the field value is converted to a string by the default conversion method before the format string that is stored in the DataFormatString property is applied.
trans-unit.target: 否则，字段值转换为字符串默认转换方法之前应用存储在数据属性中的格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，格式设置字符串应用于该字段值仅当包含数据绑定控件时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象处于只读模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To apply the formatting string to field values while in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要应用于处于编辑模式的字段值的格式设置字符串，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The formatting string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置字符串可以是任意文本字符串，并且通常包含字段的值的占位符。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the formatting string `Item Value: {0}`, the field's value is substituted for the {0} placeholder when the string is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在格式设置字符串`Item Value: {0}`，在中显示字符串时，字段的值替换 {0} 占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: The rest of the formatting string is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置字符串的其余部分将显示为文字文本。

trans-unit.source: If the formatting string does not include a placeholder, only the formatting string itself is included in the final display text (the field's value from the data source is not included).
trans-unit.target: 如果格式设置的字符串未包含占位符，仅格式设置字符串本身包含在最终显示文本 （不包含数据源的字段的值）。

trans-unit.source: If the placeholder is a 0 (zero) enclosed in curly braces as shown in the preceding example, the field value is converted to a string by the default method.
trans-unit.target: 如果占位符，如前面的示例中所示括在大括号中 0 （零） 的字段值是通过默认方法转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can append to the zero a string that specifies how the field value should be formatted.
trans-unit.target: 你可以向零追加一个字符串，指定应如何格式化的字段值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the placeholder `{0:C}` for a numeric field specifies that value of the field should be converted to a currency format.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将占位符`{0:C}`数值字段指定应将的字段的值转换为货币格式。

trans-unit.source: Formatting is applied by using the <xref:System.String.Format%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 格式设置应用通过使用<xref:System.String.Format%2A>方法。</xref:System.String.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number that follows the left curly brace is part of the syntax used by that method and indicates which one of a series of values the placeholder should use.
trans-unit.target: 后面的左大括号的数字是该方法使用的语法的一部分，并指示占位符应使用的一系列值中的哪一个。

trans-unit.source: Because there is only one field value in each cell, the number that follows the left curly brace can only be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 由于每个单元中只有一个字段值，后面的左大括号的数字只能设置为 0。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the standard format characters for numeric fields.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了数值字段的标准格式字符。

trans-unit.source: These format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays hexadecimal characters in the case that is specified.
trans-unit.target: 这些格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它在指定的情况下会显示十六进制字符。

trans-unit.source: You can append a number to most format characters in order to specify how many significant digits or decimal places you want to display.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定多少有效位数或小数位数想要显示，可以将大量追加到大多数格式字符。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In most cases, formatting depends on the server's culture setting.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在大多数情况下，格式设置依赖于服务器的区域性设置。

trans-unit.source: The examples are for a culture setting of `en-US`.
trans-unit.target: 为区域性设置的示例包括`en-US`。

trans-unit.source: |Format character|Description|Example| |----------------------|-----------------|-------------| |`C` or `c`|Displays numeric values in currency format.
You can specify the number of decimal places.|Format: `{0:C}`
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的小数位数。 |格式︰`{0:C}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:C3}`
123.456 -> $123.456| |`D` or `d`|Displays integer values in decimal format.
You can specify the number of digits.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的位数。

trans-unit.source: (Although the type is referred to as "decimal", the numbers are formatted as integers.)|Format: `{0:D}`
trans-unit.target: （尽管类型称为"小数"，数字的格式为整数。） |格式︰`{0:D}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:D6}`
1234 -> 001234| |`E` or `e`|Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.
trans-unit.target: 1234-> 001234 | |`E` or `e`|以科学记数 （指数） 格式显示数值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.|Format: `{0:E}`
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的小数位数。 |格式︰`{0:E}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:E2}`
-1052.0329112756 -> -1.05e+003| |`F` or `f`|Displays numeric values in fixed format.
You can specify the number of decimal places.|Format: `{0:F}`
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的小数位数。 |格式︰`{0:F}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:F3}`
1234.567 -> 1234.567| |`G` or `g`|Displays numeric values in general format (the most compact of either fixed-point or scientific notation).
trans-unit.target: 1234.567-> 1234.567 | |`G` or `g`|以常规格式 （最紧凑的定点或科学记数法） 显示数值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of significant digits.|Format: `{0:G}`
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定小数位数。 |格式︰`{0:G}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:G2}`
-123.456 -> -120| |`N` or `n`|Displays numeric values in number format (including group separators and optional negative sign).
trans-unit.target: -120->-123.456 | |`N` or `n`|以 （包括组分隔符和负号可选） 的数字格式显示数字值。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the number of decimal places.|Format: `{0:N}`
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的小数位数。 |格式︰`{0:N}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:N4}`
1234.567 -> 1,234.5670| |`P` or `p`|Displays numeric values in percent format.
You can specify the number of decimal places.|Format: `{0:P}`
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的小数位数。 |格式︰`{0:P}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:P1}`
.5 -> 50.0%| |`R` or `r`|Displays <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, or `BigInteger` values in round-trip format.|Format: `{0:R}`
trans-unit.target: .5-> 英寸 50.0%| |`R` or `r`|显示<xref:System.Single>、 <xref:System.Double>，或`BigInteger`往返格式中的值。 |Format: `{0:R}`</xref:System.Double></xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: 123456789.12345678 -> 123456789.12345678| |`X` or `x`|Displays integer values in hexadecimal format.
You can specify the number of digits.|Format: `{0:X}`
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的位数。 |格式︰`{0:X}`

trans-unit.source: Format: `{0:x4}`
255 -> 00ff| For more information and for examples that show formatting for other culture values, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: -> 00ff 255 | 有关详细信息和显示设置为其他区域性值的格式的示例，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom numeric format strings.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以创建自定义数字格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义数字格式字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists format characters for <xref:System.DateTime> fields.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了格式字符<xref:System.DateTime>字段。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Most of these formatting specifications result in a different output depending on culture settings.
trans-unit.target: 这些格式规范大部分导致不同的输出，具体取决于的区域性设置。

trans-unit.source: The examples are for a <xref:System.DateTime> value of 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM with a culture setting of `en-US`.
trans-unit.target: 这些示例适用于<xref:System.DateTime>值 6/15/2009年 1:45:30 PM 的区域性设置`en-US`。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: |Format character|Description|Example| |----------------------|-----------------|-------------| |`d`|Short date pattern.|Format: `{0:d}`
6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM ->Monday, June 15, 2009| |`f`|Full date/time pattern (short time).|Format: `{0:f}`
6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Monday, June 15, 2009 1:45 PM| |`F`|Full date/time pattern (long time).|Format: `{0:F}`
6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Monday, June 15, 2009 1:45:30 PM| |`g`|General date/time pattern (short time).|Format: `{0:g}`
6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 6/15/2009 1:45 PM| |`G`|General date/time pattern (long time).|Format: `{0:G}`
6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> June 15| |`O` or `o`|Round-trip date/time pattern.|Format: `{0:o}`

6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 2009-06-15T13:45:30.0900000| |`R` or `r`|RFC1123 pattern (for information, see <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.RFC1123Pattern%2A?displayProperty=fullName>).|Format: `{0:R}`
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009年 1:45:30 PM-> 2009年-06-15T13:45:30.0900000 | |`R` or `r`|RFC1123 模式 （有关信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.RFC1123Pattern%2A?displayProperty=fullName>）。 |格式︰ `{0:R}` </xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.RFC1123Pattern%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: 6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Mon, 15 Jun 2009 20:45:30 GMT| |`s`|Sortable date/time pattern.|Format: `{0:s}`
6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 1:45 PM| |`T`|Long time pattern.|Format: `{0:T}`
6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 1:45:30 PM| |`u`|Universal sortable date/time pattern.|Format: `{0:u}`
6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> 2009-06-15 20:45:30Z| |`U`|Universal full date/time pattern.|Format: `{0:U}`
6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> Monday, June 15, 2009 8:45:30 PM| |`Y` or `y`|Year month pattern.|Format: `{0:Y}`

6/15/2009 1:45:30 PM -> June, 2009| For more information and for examples that show formatting for other culture values, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 6/15/2009年 1:45:30 PM-> 2009 年 6 月，| 有关详细信息和显示设置为其他区域性值的格式的示例，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also create custom date and time format strings.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以创建自定义日期和时间格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 一个格式设置字符串，指定字段的值的显示格式。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚无特殊格式设置应用于该字段值。

trans-unit.source: Fills the specified <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object with the values from the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 填充指定<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>对象从指定的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The ExtractValuesFromCell method is provided as a convenient way to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object.
trans-unit.target: 作为一种简便方式检索从指定的字段的值提供 ExtractValuesFromCell 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 主要由控件开发人员使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method does not have a return value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法没有返回值。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 相反，通过引用返回的字段值<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>对象传入的`dictionary`参数。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After the method has been called, iterate through the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object to access the field values.
trans-unit.target: 调用该方法后，循环访问<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>对象来访问的字段值。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object contains read-only field values, you must pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter to include those values.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象包含只读字段值，则必须传递`true`为`includeReadOnly`参数以包含这些值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> used to store the values of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>用于存储指定的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> that contains the values to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> ，其中包含要检索的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the values of read-only fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括只读字段; 的值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Formats the specified field value for a cell in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 格式中的单元格的指定的字段值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The FormatDataValue method is a helper method used to transform a field value to the format specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: FormatDataValue 方法是用于转换到指定的格式的字段值的帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a field value is null, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A> property is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段值为 null 的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>返回属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.NullDisplayText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 主要由控件开发人员使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The field value to format.
trans-unit.target: 要设置格式的字段值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to encode the value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要编码值，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The field value converted to the format specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>.
trans-unit.target: 字段值转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataFormatString*>所指定的格式

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value used for a field's value when rendering the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: 检索用于字段的值，在呈现时的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>在设计器中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeValue method is a helper method used to determine what value to display for a field when rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeValue 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于确定要在呈现时为字段显示的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>在设计器中的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: If real data cannot be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果在设计时，无法从数据源检索的真实数据，此方法返回的值是改为显示。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 主要由控件开发人员使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The value to display in the designer as the field's value.
trans-unit.target: 要在设计器中作为字段的值中显示的值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the field bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 检索绑定到的字段的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The GetValue method is a helper method used to determine the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: GetValue 方法是一个帮助器方法，用于确定字段的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object is being displayed in a designer and the field value cannot be determined at design time, the value returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A> method is returned instead of the actual field value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>从对象显示在设计器中，并且不能在设计时确定字段值，返回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A>方法返回而不是实际的字段值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.GetDesignTimeValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 主要由控件开发人员使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The container for the field value.
trans-unit.target: 字段值的容器。

trans-unit.source: The value of the field bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字段的值绑定到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header of a data control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个数据控件的标头中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderText property to identify a field in a data control with a friendly name.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HeaderText 属性用来标识一个数据控件中的字段的友好名称。

trans-unit.source: The most common application of the HeaderText property is to provide meaningful column names to data-bound fields in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: HeaderText 属性的最常见的应用程序是提供有意义的列名中的数据绑定字段到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the header of a data control.
trans-unit.target: 数据控件的标头中显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether field values are HTML-encoded before they are displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Data controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Initialize%2A> method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before other methods such as `CreateRow` are called to create specific rows with data.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the caption displayed for a field when the field's value is null.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置字段的值为 null 时为字段显示的标题。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a field's value is stored as null in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 有时字段的值存储为 null 的数据源中。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a custom caption to display for fields that have a null value by setting the NullDisplayText property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定要用于通过设置 NullDisplayText 属性具有 null 值的字段显示的自定义标题。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，null 字段值显示为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: When a record is being updated or inserted in a data-bound control, if the user enters the value specified by this property (other than an empty string) for a field in a data-bound control, that value is automatically converted to null in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 记录时更新或插入在数据绑定控件中，如果用户输入的值指定的字段在数据绑定控件中，此属性 （而不是一个空字符串） 值的数据源中自动转换为 null。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To convert an empty string field value to a null value, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 若要为 null 值转换为空字符串字段值，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: The caption displayed for a field when the field's value is null.
trans-unit.target: 字段的值为 null 时，为字段显示的标题。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.target: 将绑定到字段的值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.OnDataBindField%2A>方法是一个帮助器方法，用于将数据源中的字段的值绑定到在相应的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.OnDataBindField%2A>

trans-unit.target: 字段值绑定到该控件不<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox"></xref>或<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of the field can be modified in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以在编辑模式下修改字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the ReadOnly property to prevent the values displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object from being modified.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ReadOnly 属性以防止中显示的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>从正在修改的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: When a data-bound control is in edit mode, fields that are read-only are displayed as plain text, without any editing controls.
trans-unit.target: 编辑模式的数据绑定控件时，字段是只读的显示为纯文本，且不包含任何编辑控件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ReadOnly property applies only to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> ReadOnly 属性仅适用于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: To prevent fields from showing up in insert mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止字段显示在插入模式，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to prevent the value of the field from being modified in edit mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要防止处于编辑模式; 正在修改的字段的值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The SupportsHtmlEncode property is a helper property used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class and derived classes to determine whether HTML encoding is supported by the class.
trans-unit.target: SupportsHtmlEncode 属性是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>类和派生的类，若要确定类是否支持 HTML 编码</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>所使用的帮助器属性

trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>以指示，是否支持 HTML 编码<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 表示"this"表达式。

trans-unit.source: A value that determines whether the control validates client input or not.
